tokens.name: Ballsack / SOL
tokens.ai_reasoning:
**Rationale:**  
- **BUY/SELL PRESSURE:** Ratio of 32.4 (strong buying) + stable momentum → Aggressive entry with 0% limit (market order).  
- **LIMIT ORDER:** Strong buying pressure overrides medium volatility (33.1% price change) → 0% limit.  
- **TAKE PROFIT:** Medium volume ($8,610) → +10% to +20% range; amplified to +20% due to strong buying.  
- **STOP LOSS:** Medium volatility → -8% to -15% range; set at -10% as a balanced midpoint.  
- **TIME FRAME:** Strong buying pressure implies a strong trend → 4h to 1day holding period.
